inclusion.criterion: Consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute illness/cognitive impairment resulting in inability to cooperate with ultrasound.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients that do not consent to ultrasound or sonoelastography.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has suspected diffuse liver disease and consents to participate in the study. No exclusion criteria apply.
